Obito uses a Truth-Seeking Ball to shape it into a spear-like weapon, impaling any far off opponents.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Blazing]]''.
* In the game, rather than one, Obito uses two of the spear-like weapons to pierce opponents from both the left and right.

[[fr:Parapluie de Vérité]]
[[pl:Gudōkasa]]
